summary.name: Ring Doorbell Camera 4
summary.description: The Ring Video Doorbell is an external doorbell device that houses a high-definition video camera. When pressed, the doorbell sends an alert to your smartphone or Alexa device, which allows homeowners to view and speak with whoever is at your door. Additionally, because your connected devices are alerted by any activity the sensors pick up, you will be notified and can answer the door no matter where you are in the world. Ring doorbell camera also records and saves any motion or missed alerts so they can be viewed at a later date, shared with neighbors, or provided to police in case of a crime.

overview.name: Semiconductor
overview.description: According to images, there is a Winbond-branded semiconductor located on the back of the mother/camera board inside the Ring doorbell. Most cameras have image sensor known as semiconductor sensors that converts light into electrical signals. Given this, we can assume that the Winbond semiconductor is used to detect and capture images the lense is seeing. Winbond is located in Central Taiwan Science Park, Taichung, Taiwan. Additionally, they have a base of operations in China which is the same country Ring Doorbell Cameras are known to be manufactured and set to the U.S.. So, it can be assumed that the semiconductor used in the Ring Doorbell Camera 4 was made in Taiwan at the Winbond factory and then transported to China where the doorbell is assembled.

location.address: No. 2號, Zhongke Road, Xitun District, Taichung City, Taiwan 407

overview.name: Video Processor Chip
overview.description: According to images, there is an Omnivision video processor located on the back of the mother/camera board inside the Ring doorbell. Video processors convert video input signals into viewable content. Omnivision has locations in both the U.S. and China but its main manufacturing location is Shanghai, China. Because we know that Ring doorbells are manufactured in China and several other components are made in Asia we can assume that the video processor is made in China and then sent to the larger manufacturing facility where all the parts of the ring are put together.

location.address:
No. 88, Shangke Road
Pudong District
Shanghai, 201210

overview.name: Lithium-ion Battery Pack
overview.description: Ring Doorbell Cameras all use lithium batteries as stated on their website. According to Import Yeti the Ring doorbell camera battery is made by Hongfujin Precision Industrial Shenz. And after looking at images it appears they use a lithium double battery pack. This electronics company is based in China which is an ideal location for the Ring corporation which has its whole product manufacturing company in China as well.

location.address: J2XX+M8V, Yousong Rd, 宝安区 Shenzhen, Guangdong Province, China, 518131

overview.name: Motion Sensors
overview.description: The Ring Video Doorbell Camera automatically turns on, starts recording, and sends a notification to the homeowners devises when it senses some is near. at, or approaching the front door. This means that the camera is not on 24/7 it only switches on when the motion sensor inside the camera are activated by external movement in front of the house. When customers first receive their Ring doorbell, the motion sensors are set to a particular distance and range meaning if any movement is detected within the active viewing field the device will switch on. The sensors can be set to be more sensitive and span a greater range of field although the device owner will be notified that raising the sensors sensitivity range will drain the internal battery back faster than if it left at the standard rang. According to Import Yeti the Ring Doorbell uses motion sensors manufactured by Vision Automobile Electronics. This company makes their products in Taiwan similar to many of the other components in Ring's products.

location.address:

overview.name: Wide Angle Fresnel Flood Light Lens
overview.description: This lense is great for capturing objects that are closer to the camera yet it is less clear when capturing objects that are further away. However, this lense allows the camera to capture a wide image meaning more can fit into the screen. Goertek Technology Vina

overview.name: Light & Sound Sensors
overview.description: Gemstar Technology Yang Zhou. The light and sound sensors are important towards the overall contribution of the Ring Camera as one of its main purposes is to notify the homeowner if someone is at the door. This would be impossible if it weren't for these sensors going off whenever there is light or movement by the doorsteps.

location.address: Junsheng Road Fanshui Industrial Zone Baoying Yangzhou

overview.name: Screws
overview.description: Goldtek Technology. The screws are essential for the camera as they are the glue of the camera. They enable the parts to be held together and allow all the parts to work together in order to become the Ring Camera. The screws are also designed in a way where they are barely even visible, allowing for a cleaner finish to the doorbell camera.

overview.name: Mounting Bracket
overview.description: Goldtek Technology. The mounting bracket is essentially the glue of the ring camera as it is what can hold the camera in place. In other words, it attaches the device to the outdoor wall. It is black and gives a sleek finish when it is on.

overview.description: Bandegua S A. An Internal Temperature monitor is extremely important because it provides safety for the users of the Ring camera and helps track if the device is overheating, potentially risky.

overview.name: Distribution Facility
overview.description: Ring has six major distribution centers where it receives the constructed doorbell cameras from overseas where they were manufactured.
